title: New: Gray Things – Class
body: If you take even one step into the world of **[Cats Purring](http://www.catspurring.com/)**, the record label/collective that’s getting so much attention at the moment, you’re going to find yourself some of the most fun-filled and adventurous pop music going at the moment. The new tune from **[Gray Things](http://www.myspace.com/graythingsmusic)**, a recent collaborator with **[Dent May](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/10227-new-dent-may-wedding-day/ "New: Dent May – Wedding Day")** no less, is a sassy, funk fueled little gem. As great pop songs so often do, it centers around a girl. I haven’t met her, and I probably never will, but my god she must be incredible; just listen.

The new tune from Gray Things, a recent collaborator with Dent May no less, \[…\]
